titles.title: CB 149 He Brought Us Into His Banqueting Table

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
HE BROUGHT US IN TO HIS BANQUETING
TABLE.
His banner over us is love. (3x)
His banner over us is love.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am my Beloved's and He is mine, His banner
over us is love...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He lifts us up to the heavenly places, His banner
over us is love...

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I love Him and He loves me, His banner over us is
love...
